jobDescription: Citi Bike is looking for a Data Operations Intern to join our Operations Strategy team. As a Data Operations Intern, you’ll be tackling unique challenges facing a budding industry alongside fellow transportation enthusiasts and cyclists to help drive internal operations, technical and business decisions, and customer engagement.  Key Responsibilities: Design, implement and measure the impact of creative incentives to keep Citi Bike bicycles in good maintenance and stations properly balanced.Build reporting metrics for numerous internal and external dependencies.Develop tools to help integrate data into day-to-day operations decisions from a variety of sources.Gather insights from system data to inform decisions across departments. Required Skills and Experience: Working towards a degree in Environmental or Urban Studies, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Transportation, Economics, or similar subject.Comfortable working with large datasets and familiar with database design.Working knowledge of: Excel, SQL, Python, R, JavaScript, MapBox and/or CartoDB, D3.js.Adept working across data analytics and operational strategy environments.Excellent organization and time management skills; must be able to work independently in a fast-paced environment and take initiative to solve problems and complete tasks as they arise.Passionate about bike share and transportation!
